Properties

CodeURLTypeDescription
statushttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#statuscodeStatus of the concept
deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0251 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
WP Product withdrawn permanentlyProduct withdrawn permanently
WT Product withdrawn temporarilyProduct withdrawn temporarily
DR Product dose or frequency of use reducedProduct dose or frequency of use reduced
DI Product dose or frequency of use increasedProduct dose or frequency of use increased
OT OtherOther
N NoneNone

name: ActionTakenInResponseToTheEvent
title: actionTakenInResponseToTheEvent
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts used to define the action taken as a result of an event related to a product issue.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the PCR segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0251 (Action Taken in Response to the Event)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

concept.display: Product dose or frequency of use reduced
concept.definition: Product dose or frequency of use reduced

concept.display: Product dose or frequency of use increased
concept.definition: Product dose or frequency of use increased
